Comment: In my experience, Maine Democrats are some of the most odious in the entire country being noxiously left-wing with a plain superiority complex. This is the sort of thing you get when the entire state is an excellent example of the “town and gown” phenomenon.
Author: SouthernNumismatist

Comment: Censuring an opposition politician for "WrongThink" is probably a precedent we don't want to see.
Author: AppState1981
